lexUnit.name: scowl.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: frown in an angry or bad-tempered way.

sentence.text: She scowled darkly , realising he 'd deftly avoided answering her implicit question .
Nicolo was standing in the centre of the room , scowling darkly at her .
One of them looked at his wristwatch , pursed his lips and scowled fiercely .
Bill raised himself on his elbows and scowled fiercely .
Lisa scowled at his back as he disappeared through the doorway , hating the ambivalence of the feelings that churned inside her .
Gimmelmann nodded , and scowled at Dolly in the mirror .
Behind the glass an official from the Political Branch scowled at a worried-looking black .
Ronni scowled at Guido mutinously , as he raised the red geranium to his nose .
The man scowled at her .
Lissa jumped , shocked to the core , and he scowled at her darkly .
As he pulled open the passenger door for her , she scowled at him defiantly .
McEnroe , with his widely-publicised marital problems , looked anything but happy to be here , refusing to answer questions and scowling at photographers .
Nutty sat on the edge with her legs in the water , scowling in deep concentration after Nails .
Heg scowled in the darkness .
She scowled in disgust at the sight of her drooping mouth and reddened eyes .
It would leave Britain ` scowling in frustration " on the sidelines of the Community .
Shiona scowled into his face with its arrogant high cheekbones , self-satisfied mouth and eyes as hard as sapphires .
Scowling with concentration he began to load the six chambers of his Colt Patent Repeating Pistol with the lead which dragged down one pocket of his scarecrow 's morning coat .
He scowled with squinting ferocity , like a balked Siamese cat .
De Nesle scowled briefly , and then , as if remembering something , smiled again .
The Collector scowled disagreeably .
Even more annoyed by that intrusive thought , Guy scowled furiously as Isabel rose and took a beaker from the table , filling it with water from the pail .
Marcel scowled then ran after him .
Major Vanavskaya put down the phone and scowled .
Blondel scowled , and then grabbed the headgear from the Lombard brothers and rammed it down over the ears of the prisoners .
